text: Yeah I know about those but my purist side prefers the unaltered/mono 8-bit sound. It's how I've always heard it as a kid, added stereo/echo removes part of the nostalgic sound.

author: Ruboka

text: Hey there, Indiana Jones! This platformer never left Japan (like the system it's on). I have no idea if it's any good, but it does have music composed by Yamashita which is why I learned about this game in the first place. She had just finished composing for the first Castlevania and﻿ it shows.
author: SupraDarky
